actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to assist in the commemoration of the Revolutionary War battle fought at Savannah, Ga.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to provide technical and financial assistance to Revolutionary Battle Park Incorporated and to the Savannah-Chathan County Historic Site and Monument Commission in commemorating the siege of Savannah, Georgia of October 9, 17779.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to assist in the commemoration of the Revolutionary War battle fought at Savannah, Ga.
